name: Ancient Hogs
description:
Ancient Hogs

You are a happy hunter gatherer living peacefully in the year 10,000 BC. One night, you have a dream, a vision of a horrific future in which farming has created a repulsive modern civilization, full of mind-numbing technology. You realize that it is up to you to prevent this disgusting agricultural revolution, and the only way to do this is to provide your tribe with enough delicious hog meat to prevent crop domestication.

Instructions

WASD to move, shift to sprint. Click to pick up spears and hogs.

Kill and carry the hogs back to your cave before 6PM each day.

Credits

Sam Harrison (@manan): Programming, Graphics, Sound Design

Pondylus: Music (Day 1)

MichaelHead: Music (Day 2)

Can-phone: Music (Win Screen)
